content.raw:
Hi Ian

This is not a straightforward transformation/frame/extrinsics problem, but rather an issue with the point cloud itself (the data is garbage for me right now). Can you confirm that my plugin code produces a sensible point cloud in rviz on your computer? If it does, then it's probably down to the shader not working as expected in VMWare.

Cheers
Andrew
